Detailed Description

A theme describes the look of all components like controls, windows and drawable objects.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum Theme::BitmapResId
 

The bitmap resource ID allows to classify bitmaps by their rule to receive them in Theme::GetBitmap.

Enumerator:
SelectedCheckBoxId  Bitmap used for a selected checkbox.
DeselectedCheckBoxId  Bitmap used for a deselected checkbox.
SelectedRadioButtonId  Bitmap used for a selected radiobutton.
DeselectedRadioButtonId  Bitmap used for a deselected radionbutton.

Member Function Documentation

const BitmapRes * Theme::GetBitmap (  BitmapResId  id  )  const [virtual]
 

Returns a pointer to a bitmap resource which is defined by the ID id.

virtual const ControlFrameView* Theme::GetControlFrameView (   )  const [pure virtual]
 

Returns a pointer to a control frame view, which is used to draw the frame of a control including the background of the client area.

Implemented in BlackAndWhiteTheme, BlueSkyChineseTheme, BlueSkyTheme, DefaultChineseTheme, DefaultTheme, FoggyTheme, TestTheme, CustomizableTheme, DefaultTheme, and FoggyTheme.

INT Theme::GetFontId (  SystemFontId  id  )  const
 

Returns the font-ID, which corresponds to the system-font specified by id.

const WCHAR * Theme::GetName (   )  const [virtual]
 

Returns the name of the theme. Per default 0 is returned.

Reimplemented in CustomizableTheme, DefaultTheme, and FoggyTheme.

const PanelView * Theme::GetPanelView (   )  const [virtual]
 

Returns a pointer to a panel view, which is used to draw an instance of the class Panel. The panel usually is aligned at the bottom of the desktop and shows the softkeys.

Reimplemented in CustomizableTheme, DefaultTheme, and FoggyTheme.

virtual const PositionIndicatorView* Theme::GetPositionIndicatorView (   )  const [pure virtual]
 

Returns a pointer to a position indicator view, which is used to draw an instance of the class PositionIndicator.

Implemented in BlackAndWhiteTheme, BlueSkyChineseTheme, BlueSkyTheme, DefaultChineseTheme, DefaultTheme, FoggyTheme, TestTheme, CustomizableTheme, DefaultTheme, and FoggyTheme.

virtual const ProgressBarView* Theme::GetProgressBarView (   )  const [pure virtual]
 

Returns a pointer to a progress bar view, which is used to draw an instance of the class ProgressBar.

Implemented in BlackAndWhiteTheme, BlueSkyChineseTheme, BlueSkyTheme, DefaultChineseTheme, DefaultTheme, FoggyTheme, TestTheme, CustomizableTheme, DefaultTheme, and FoggyTheme.

virtual const PushButtonView* Theme::GetPushButtonView (   )  const [pure virtual]
 

Returns a pointer to a push-button view, which is used to draw an instance of the class PushButton.

Implemented in BlackAndWhiteTheme, BlueSkyChineseTheme, BlueSkyTheme, DefaultChineseTheme, DefaultTheme, FoggyTheme, TestTheme, CustomizableTheme, DefaultTheme, and FoggyTheme.

ColorValue Theme::GetSystemColor (  SystemColorId  id  )  const [virtual]
 

Returns a color-value of the system-color with the id id specified by the system-color-table. This method must not be overwritten by derived themes, when GetSystemColorTable has been overwritten. To stay backward-compatible with older versions of APOXI, 0 is returned if no system-color-table is provided.

Reimplemented in BlackAndWhiteTheme, BlueSkyChineseTheme, BlueSkyTheme, DefaultChineseTheme, FoggyTheme, and TestTheme.

const ColorTable * Theme::GetSystemColorTable (   )  const [virtual]
 

Returns a pointer to the color-table of the system-colors. This method should be overwritten by derived themes providing a pointer to a custom color-table. To stay backward-compatible with older versions of APOXI, 0 is returned in the default-implementation.

Reimplemented in DefaultTheme, CustomizableTheme, DefaultTheme, and FoggyTheme.

const TabButtonView * Theme::GetTabButtonView (   )  const [virtual]
 

Returns a pointer to a tab button view, which is used to draw an instance of the class TabButton. A tab button is embedded inside a tab control.

Reimplemented in DefaultTheme, and FoggyTheme.

const TabControlView * Theme::GetTabControlView (   )  const [virtual]
 

Returns a pointer to a tab control view, which is used to draw an instance of the class TabControl.

Reimplemented in DefaultTheme, and FoggyTheme.

virtual const WindowFrameView* Theme::GetWindowFrameView (   )  const [pure virtual]
 

Returns a pointer to a window frame view, which is used to draw the frame of a window including the background of the client area.

Implemented in BlackAndWhiteTheme, BlueSkyChineseTheme, BlueSkyTheme, DefaultChineseTheme, DefaultTheme, FoggyTheme, TestTheme, CustomizableTheme, DefaultTheme, and FoggyTheme.

void Theme::SetSystemColor (  SystemColorId  id,
ColorValue  color_value

void Theme::Update (   )  [virtual]
 

Converts all colors given by the system-color-table to system-colors and invokes View::Update(this) for every View which is part of the theme. Also the fonts are updated which may be specified by ThemeConfig::GetFontId().

Reimplemented in DefaultChineseTheme, DefaultTheme, FoggyTheme, CustomizableTheme, DefaultTheme, and FoggyTheme.
